hero.title: Kuza
hero.description: Urubuga rugezweho rw'amatsinda y'ubwizigame mu Rwanda. Kurikirana imisanzu, gucunga inguzanyo, no kubaka ubutunzi bw'umuryangoâ€”byose ahantu hamwe hizewe.
hero.demoDescription: Reba uko byoroshye gucunga itsinda ryawe ry'Ikimina n'urubuga rwacu

features.title: Ibyo
features.description: Ibikoresho bikomeye byateguwe cyane cyane ku matsinda y'ubwizigame y'u Rwanda. Byoroshye gukoresha, byizewe by'agateganyo.

contributionTracking.title: Gukurikirana Imisanzu
contributionTracking.description: Kurikirana imisanzu ya buri kwezi cyangwa buri cyumweru hamwe n'ibirikumbuzo byikora no kwerekana abishyuye batinze.

smartLoans.title: Inguzanyo Zihanga
smartLoans.description: Gucunga inguzanyo hamwe n'ingingo z'inyungu zihinduka, kubara inyungu bikora, n'imishinga yo kwishyura.

memberManagement.title: Gucunga Abanyamuryango
memberManagement.description: Kwinjiza abanyamuryango bashya byoroshye, gutanga inshingano, no gukurikirana amateka y'imisanzu ku muntu ku muntu.

groupIsolation.title: Ubuzima Bwite bw'Itsinda
groupIsolation.description: Amakuru yose aba yibanda ku itsinda ryawe gusa. Buri tsinda ribona amakuru yaryo gusa.

reportsAnalytics.title: Raporo n'Isesengura
reportsAnalytics.description: Imibare y'igihe nyacyo igaragaza ubwizigame bwose, inguzanyo zikora, inyungu zabonetse, n'imikoreshereze y'abanyamuryango.

smartNotifications.title: Ibimenyetso Bihanga
smartNotifications.description: Ibirikumbuzo bikora byikora ku munsi w'imisanzu, kwishyura inguzanyo, n'amakuru y'ingenzi.

exportReports.title: Gukura Raporo
exportReports.description: Kuramo raporo zuzuye mu buryo bwa PDF cyangwa CSV ku kubika inyandiko no kugenzura.

secureAuth.title: Kwemererwa Gutewe
secureAuth.description: Umutekano nk'uw'ibanki hamwe n'uburenganzira bw'abayobozi, abamukarani, n'abanyamuryango.

howItWorks.title: Uko
howItWorks.description: Tangira ikimina cyawe mu ntambwe enye zoroshye

step1.title: Kora Itsinda Ryawe
step1.description: Shiraho Ikimina yawe mu minota mike. Ongeraho abanyamuryango kandi ushyireho amategeko y'imisanzu.

step2.title: Kwakira Imisanzu
step2.description: Abanyamuryango batanga imisanzu buri gihe. Kurikirana kwishyura no kohereza ibirikumbuzo bikora.

step3.title: Gucunga Inguzanyo
step3.description: Gutanga inguzanyo n'inyungu. Kurikirana kwishyura no kubara inyungu bikora.

step4.title: Gukura Hamwe
step4.description: Reba ubutunzi bw'itsinda ryawe bukura. Bona raporo kandi mwishimire intsinzi hamwe.

pricing.title: Ibiciro Byoroheje,
pricing.description: Hitamo gahunda ikwiriye itsinda ryawe. Ibiciro byose mu mafaranga y'u Rwanda (RWF).

paymentInfo.title: Amakuru y'Ubwishyu
paymentInfo.description: Kugira ngo wiyandikishe ku gahunda yishyurwa, ohereza kwishyu kwawe binyuze muri Mobile Money kuri:
paymentInfo.note: Nyuma yo kwishyura, twandikire hamwe na nimero y'ubwishyu kugira ngo dutangire gahunda yawe.

cta.title: Witeguye Guhindura Ikimina Yawe?
cta.description: Ifatanye n'amatsinda y'ubwizigame y'u Rwanda amaze gukoresha eKimina mu kubaka ubutunzi bw'umuryango mu buziranenge no kwizerwa.
cta.note: Nta karita y'amafaranga isabwa â€¢ Ubuntu buhoraho ku matsinda mato

footer.description: Urubuga rugezweho rw'amatsinda y'ubwizigame y'u Rwanda. Kubaka ubutunzi bw'umuryango mu cyizere no kumarana neza.

auth.signInDescription: Injira kugira ngo ucunge itsinda ry'Ikimina ryawe
auth.createAccountDescription: Tangira gucunga Ikimina yawe uyu munsi

validation.passwordMin: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira nibura inyuguti 6

systemNotices.title: Amatangazo y'Urubuga
systemNotices.description: Amatangazo y'ingenzi aturuka ku rubuga rwa eKimina
systemNotices.checkBack: Garuka nyuma ku makuru y'ingenzi y'urubuga.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.description: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa ukeneye ubufasha? Turi hano ku bwawe. Twandikire kandi tuzagusubiza vuba.
contact.formDescription: Uzuza ifishi ikurikira kandi tuzagusubiza mu masaha 24
contact.name: Izina Ryawe
contact.subject: Insanganyamatsiko
